channel.title: File Attributes on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in File Attributes on TLDRBins

item.title: Find
item.description: Linux Locate a File locate <FILE> Files of Type 'File' find . -type f Find and Open find / -name <FILE> -exec cat {} \; SetUID and SetGID Files find / -type f -user root \( -perm -4000 -o -perm -2000 \) 2>/dev/null -ls Files Owned by User find / -user <USER> -ls 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e " \/proc" -e " \/sys" Files Owned by Group find / -group <GROUP> 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e ^/proc -e ^/sys World Writable Files and Directories (Exclude Sticky Bit) find / -type f,d \( -perm -0002 -a !

item.title: Find (Windows)
item.description: Windows Show Hidden Files # Show hidden files in current directory Get-ChildItem -Force # Recusive Get-ChildItem -Path '<PATH>' -Recurse -Force 2>$Null Find a File ls -path '<PATH>' -Filter '<FILE>' -recurse -erroraction silent where /R '<PATH>' '<FILE>' # Find files with wildcard Get-ChildItem -Path '<PATH>' -Recurse -Force -Include '<PATTERN>' 2>$Null *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\programdata> Get-ChildItem -Path 'C:\' -Recurse -Force -Include 'flag.*' 2>$Null Directory: C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop Mode LastWriteTime Length Name ---- ------------- ------ ---- -a---- 10/27/2017 4:02 PM 24 flag.
